M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.mygdx.game.desktop.DesktopLauncher
Runs the game on a desktop computer
main(String[]) - Static method in class com.mygdx.game.testers.JUnitMapTest
Runs the JUnit tester
MainMenu - Class in com.mygdx.game.screens
This screen is the main menu of Gauntlet.
MainMenu(Malice, Music) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.screens.MainMenu
Creates a MainMenu screen and stores the Malice object that created this screen as well as the music object that is currently playing.
Malice - Class in com.mygdx.game
The Malice class extends Game and handles all the screens in the Gauntlet game.
Malice() - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.Malice
 
Map - Class in com.mygdx.game.world
Map class displays a map using tiles in a 2D array.
Map(int, int) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.world.Map
Constructs a map filled with walls Prepares Pixmap arrays for use in createMap() from predetermined files
Map(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.world.Map
For JUnit Testing only (in order to avoid graphics: Textures and Pixmaps)
MAP_SIZE - Static variable in class com.mygdx.game.screens.GameScreen
Size of the map
MAP_SIZE - Static variable in class com.mygdx.game.testers.JUnitMapTest
 
marginOfDelta - Static variable in class com.mygdx.game.player.Enemy
The margin of change for the Enemy to choose directions
MimicGdx - Class in com.mygdx.game
The MimicGdx Class isolates nearly all input from the Gdx class This will allow 2 purposes: - provides the functionality of an options screen when implemented - Allows for better JUnit testing as many methods would be unable to be tested, commented methods can simulate input for testing if implemented
MimicGdx() - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.MimicGdx
 
move(Character, ArrayList<Projectile>, long) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.player.Character
This method should be overridden for better functionality moves sprite according to its current direction This method should also be called by overridden method to update animations
move() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.player.Character
Moves sprite according to its current direction.
move(Character, ArrayList<Projectile>, long) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.player.Enemy
 
move(Character, ArrayList<Projectile>, long) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.player.Player
 
move() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.projectile.Projectile
Moves this projectile on the line with slope based on the given xDistance and yDistance from constructor Updates animation based on time Cannot be JUnit tested due to animations
MUTED - Static variable in class com.mygdx.game.MimicGdx
